author: maya
post: When I read the story, I was moved by it. There were moments when I felt like crying because I was so overwhelmed with joy that this little boy met Jesus. But, after talking to my brother about the story, we had some questions and I would like to get feedback on them. Heaven is supposed to be a mystery to us here on Earth, so is God and Jesus and their work, so why do we know all of a sudden what He looks like? Why are we so lucky today to know such details about Paradise? And most importanty, why is it being published for all to see?.
title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
